May the Lord impress fathers and mothers with the sacredness of the responsibility resting on them. As you unite with the Lord in bringing your children up in His fear, you are prepared for--I was going to say higher responsibilities, but I cannot. There is no higher responsibility than the training of children.--Ms 17, 1902 (Written February 11, 1902). 





Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
January 11, 1990. Entire Ms.
